member.name: F:Drivers.Net.EthernetAddress.Length
member.summary: Length of an Ethernet address in bytes.

member.name: F:Drivers.Net.EthernetAddress.Bridge
member.summary: Bridge Group Address. Reserved by IEEE 802.1D, Table 7-9, 1998 Edition: ...-00 is the Bridge Group Address, used for Spanning Tree Protocol

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.EthernetAddress.Parse(System.String,Drivers.Net.EthernetAddress@)
member.summary: Converts an string into an EthernetAddress instance.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: T:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter
member.summary: Converts host ordered integer base types to network ordered array of bytes, and vice-versa.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.ToInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a host-order 16-bit signed integer converted from two bytes in a byte array.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.ToUInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a host-order 16-bit unsigned integer converted from two bytes in a byte array.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.ToInt32(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a host-order 32-bit signed integer converted from two bytes in a byte array.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.ToUInt32(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a host-order 32-bit unsigned integer converted from two bytes in a byte array.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.ToInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a host-order 64-bit signed integer converted from two bytes in a byte array.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.ToUInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns a host-order 64-bit unsigned integer converted from two bytes in a byte array.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.GetBytes(System.Int16)
member.returns: Returns network ordered bytes representing 16-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.GetBytes(System.UInt16)

member.returns: Returns network ordered bytes representing 64-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.GetBytes(System.UInt64)
member.returns: Returns network ordered bytes representing 64-bit unsigned integer.

member.name: M:Drivers.Net.NetworkBitConverter.PutBytes(System.Int16,System.Byte[]!Microsoft.Contracts.NonNullType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a host-ordered 16-bit signed integer into network order and place result in a byte array. Value to be placed into byte array. Byte array to receive value. Offset in buffer to place value.
